name: Pan Paira Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Pan Paira Recipe: Khoya ½ kg Sugar 250 grams Green Cardamom Powder ½ tsp Red Colour 1 tsp Dry fruit ½ cup Clarified Butter ½ cup
instructions: Take a cooking pan add ½ cup of clarified butter , heat the clarified butter Add 250 grams of sugar when its dissolve in the clarified butter add ½ kg of khoya mix it well When the colour starts to change Add ½ tsp of green cardamoms powder mix it well , and remove from heat Take it out into two separate bowls Add red food colour in a one bowl shape it to the pan. At last garnish with ½ cup of dry fruits , chilled and serve
